Constructor Detail

RSSParser

public RSSParser()
Default RSSParser constructor.

RSSParser

public RSSParser(java.lang.String location)
Reads from an RSS feed news items. This constructor parses the information into a DOM document using a NodeFilter.

Parameters:
location - - the RSS feed location
Method Detail

storeItem

public int storeItem()
Adds unique news items to the 'rss_items' table, in a database. Returns the number of new items stored.

Parameters:
my_items - - NodeIterator of nodes meeting the new items qualifications. The node's parent must be a named 'items'.
Returns:
int num_stored - the number of new unique items added to table

clearDB

public void clearDB()
Deletes all rows from the table 'rss_items' in databe 'mrcooper'.

addSlashes

public java.lang.String addSlashes(java.lang.String s)
Adds in slashes before apostrophes to a string input.

Parameters:
s - string to modify.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method to create a new RSSParser object.

Parameters:
args[0] - - the url which contains the RSS feed
